EmailTemplate.description: Template used for initial cold email outreach
EmailTemplate.name: Cold Outreach
EmailTemplate.subject: Invite to WeWork
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I came across your company on LinkedIn and would love to hear more about what your team is doing. I'd also like to personally invite you to our EVENT NAME + LINK this DAY, DATE and to come tour the new floors at our TARGET LOCATION + LINK location in CITY.
We would love to meet you and explore having you join our global community of creators. Please let me know what day/time works best for you or simply book a tour online [INSERT LINK].
Thanks, and have a great day!
